@keveman, @josh11b I feel like we should allow the following public headers from libraries as we do in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD#L22

@yaroslavvb have you tried not using bazel and trying to build your code using https://www.tensorflow.org/how_tos/adding_an_op/#building_the_op_library and then just loading the .so? I suspect that will work because we package more headers there.
